General.Name: Villa Kunalai Public Company Limited
General.Description: Villa Kunalai Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. It develops single house, town homes, semi-detached houses, and commercial buildings. Villa Kunalai Public Company Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.
General.Address: No. 819 Moo 7, Bang Bua Thong, Thailand, 11110
